howToUpdate: 1. Add your images to the attached_assets/stock_images/ folder
3. Add your image import (e.g., import myImage from '@assets/stock_images/my-image.jpg')
4. Add the filename to the imageMap object (e.g., 'my-image.jpg': myImage)
5. Update the 'image' field in this config file to use your new filename
6. You can also change the title and description text here without touching code
